page.title: 12STAGE SCHOOL
page.content: I have recently left{stage school } where you sing and dance. The day starts at 9.30 and ends at 3.30 p.m. In the morning we do the traditional school lessons, but after dinner we change into our dancing gear and limber up. We normally start with{ {ballet}initially doing bar exercises followed by work in the middle of the floor. Secondly, we do{tap dancing} followed by{modern dancing.}After a short break, the afternoon proceeds with a session of acting, singing, drama and stagework. The day is finished by discussing acting and television work and then we all go home. A great deal of time is also spent rehearsing and performing productions...by Susan Aylward.
